properties.content: How to?

Instructions:

1. Go to:  40.233.70.245

2. Select "Join as Participant"

3. Enter the Room Code, a name, and pick an avatar

4. Click Join!
5. Questions will appear on your phone as the quiz goes on!

Scoring:

Once a question is complete the first person to have submitted the correct answers gets 100 points, all other correct answers get points based on how much slower they were, (i.e. 10% slower is 90 points)

Bonus points can be assigned at my discretion!


ALWAYS REMEMBER TO CLICK SUBMIT!!!
